attributes.action: Instate my fiancee Linda Whiston as the new England football team Head coach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After long discussions regarding the current England manager my fiancee has come to the conclusion that she would make a much better England footbal manager. She has advised that she would be willing to manage the national team for a franction of the cost. I feel it only fair to give the current England manager another game to see if results/performancesz can improve and then would request that my fiancee is installed as the new head coach with immediate effect should the results not improve.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
